name: Jellyboy
description:
Jellyboy is a 2D Platformer where in order to complete the level, you must collect all the coins and grab the pizza! Because if there's anything that Jellyboy loves, it's pizza. Made with Construct 3 for LOWREZJAM 2021.

ESTIMATED RUNTIME

Depending on your skill, this could take anywhere from 2-5 minutes, if that. The game sports 9 levels but they're all pretty short and straightforward.

CONTROLS

Left/Right: A/D

Jump: W

Restart level: R

CREDITS

Programming, Art, SoundFX: kitifulnines

Music: Eris Faye
